title: What do you people think of teammates leaving just before game starts
body: So yeah, I've submitted feedback about this, but I'm seeing that people are able to leave a game just before the loading screen pops up and just before the match lobby client closes, and the game still goes on it does not exit everyone back into the match making queue. What do people think about that?

replies.body: It's troll. I love leaving at 3s to go.
you gotta hit the next level by leave after the 3 min mark to negate the remake

> [{quoted}](name=Kataphract,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=j5YQJ5sa,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-14T06:49:52.418+0000)
>
> you gotta hit the next level by leave after the 3 min mark to negate the remake

If you leave at 3s before the game starts, the game terminates and everyone is thrown back into the queue.

Also, you don't need to be next level, just be there. Get a CS and just walk around.

It's pretty frustrating, especially when it happens in ranked where you just sat through a 5 minute draft phase. 

It's one of the things /remake was designed to address. While it does seem like a waste of time to get into a game where someone has quit / hasn't connected, remake luckily saves you from having to sit through 15-20 minutes and potential LP loss.
